content: Hello Pandas!Our coin is called Pandanite, a bitcoin like cryptocurrency. Community has decided on a new name for us.(previously known as Bamboo - BMB)Website: https://pandanite.com/ Website2: https://pandanite-crypto.github.io/Github: https://github.com/pandanite-cryptoWhitepaper aka pdnpaper: https://github.com/pandanite-crypto/pdnpaper/blob/main/whitepaper.pdfExplorer(s): https://explorer.0xf10.com/ - operationalhttps://shifu.mrpandabear.org/explorer/ - development halted, elixir based https://pandascan.io/ - investigating issueName: PandaniteTicker: PDNMax supply: 100 million PDNBlock Reward: 50 PDNProof of Work (POW)Algo: Pufferfish2 Â - CPU/GPU"Twothirding" instead of halving - every 666666+1 blocksASIC ResistantThis topic is the successor of https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5372707.0 , original OP isn't active anymore sadly.About us:Pandanite (PDN) a new Proof of Work (POW) cryptocurrency, using ED25519 signing keys. Fast transactions, minimal and elegant code. It is written from the ground up in C++. We want the Pandanite source code to be simple, elegant, and easy to understand. Rather than adding duct-tape to an existing currency, we built Pandanite from scratch with lots of love.Mining payments occur using the *thwothirding* algorithm, which yields a total final circulation of ~100M PDN:- 50 PDN per block until block 666666- 50\*(2/3) PDN per block from blocks 666667 to 2\*666666- 50\*(2/3)^2 PDN per block from blocks 2\*66666+1 to 3\*666666etc.Socials:Twitter: https://twitter.com/pdn_pandaniteReddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/pandanite/Telegram: https://t.me/pandaniteDiscord: https://discord.com/invite/crfkWjxYyTMastodon: https://techhub.social/@pandaniteThanks for your time!Pandanite Team
